19 template <class Base>
20 class TUpdateManagerWrap: virtual public Base
21 {
22 public:
23  typedef Base BaseClass;
24 
25  TUpdateManagerWrap();
26 
27  // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
28  virtual void BeginChanges(int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* changeParamsPtr = NULL);
29  virtual void EndChanges(int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* changeParamsPtr = NULL);
30 
31 private:
32  int m_changeCounter;
33  int m_cumulatedFlags;
34 };
35 
36 
37 // public methods
38 
39 template <class BaseClass>
40 TUpdateManagerWrap<BaseClass>::TUpdateManagerWrap()
41 {
42  m_changeCounter = 0;
43 }
44 
45 
46 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
47 
48 template <class BaseClass>
49 void TUpdateManagerWrap<BaseClass>::BeginChanges(int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* changeParamsPtr)
50 {
51  Q_ASSERT(m_changeCounter >= 0);
52 
53  if (m_changeCounter++ == 0){
54  BaseClass::BeginChanges(changeFlags, changeParamsPtr);
55  m_cumulatedFlags = changeFlags;
56  }
57  else{
58  m_cumulatedFlags |= changeFlags;
59  }
60 }
61 
62 
63 template <class BaseClass>
64 void TUpdateManagerWrap<BaseClass>::EndChanges(int changeFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* changeParamsPtr)
65 {
66  Q_ASSERT(m_changeCounter > 0);
67 
68  if (--m_changeCounter == 0){
69  m_cumulatedFlags |= changeFlags;
70 
71  BaseClass::EndChanges(m_cumulatedFlags, changeParamsPtr);
72  }
73  else{
74  m_cumulatedFlags &= ~BaseClass::CF_ABORTED;
75  }
76 }
77

79 } // namespace istd

istd.h
istd::TUpdateManagerWrap
Help wrapper class allowing to reduce nested update notifying by counting of changes.
